raw_body: Mala Mangalika Ranasinghe nee Jinasena Dearly beloved wife of Major Gen. (Rtd.) Niranjan Asoka Ranasinghe, loving mother of Imanee and Nishadee, mother-in-law of Chamitha, much loved grandmother of Rylie & Minalie, daughter of late Mr & Mrs I.S. Jinasena, daughter-in-law of late Mr & Mrs Henry Ranasinghe, loving sister of Sriyani, late Asoka and late Sunil, Padmini, Kalyani & Mahinda, sister-in-law of Mr & Mrs S.V. Ranasinghe (Australia), Mr & Mrs T. Bulathwalage (UK), late Sumeda, Mangala, Rani, Gunatilaka, late Abeywickrema and Priyanthi. Remains lie at No. 06, Ohlums Place, Borella (off Cotta Road), from 9.00 a.m. Tuesday the 19th March, 2024. Cortege leaves residence at 4.30 p.m. on Wednesday the 20th March 2024 for cremation at the Old Crematorium, Borella Cemetery, at 5.00 p.m. Grieving Family.
